summary:
Contribute to the development of open-source Photonic Integrated Circuits simulation packages (called Simphony and SiPANN). 
Top contributor of gdsfactory, an open-source EDA tool for PICs
Developed efficient and cost-effective nanocatalysts to mitigate N2O levels in the atmosphere using DFT and MD computations

Studied chiroptical properties of a novel plasmonic polymer through FDTD simulations.
Studied the structural stability of nanocatalysts using computational methods.
